channel.title: How do you change port in dodian/devolution?
channel.description: Im trying to change the port in dodian/devolution. so i go into server.java change it from 43594 to 5555 and i compile sucessfully. Try to start up the server and it says server already in use then loads the npc's and what-not. I do have a nother server running, but i dont want to let people onto the devolution as im trying to switch over to it. What can i do?

item.title: How do you change port in dodian/devolution?
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[quote=“Soul Breaker, post:3, topic:174425”]Well, you can actually run 2 servers, but different kind.
If it’s the same kind, it won’t work.

Like Richscape and Dodian - IT WONT WORK
If it’s Project CZAR and Dodian - IT WILL WORK[/quote]
Yes, i know, the one i have running right now is Winter Love source, and im trying to run a dodian source on a diffrent port, and it wont work!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change port in dodian/devolution?

item.title: How do you change port in dodian/devolution?

@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Well, you can actually run 2 servers, but different kind.
If it’s the same kind, it won’t work.

Like Richscape and Dodian - IT WONT WORK
If it’s Project CZAR and Dodian - IT WILL WORK

item.title: How do you change port in dodian/devolution?
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Im trying to change the port in dodian/devolution.
so i go into server.java change it from 43594 to 5555 and i compile sucessfully. Try to start up the server and it says server already in use then loads the npc’s and what-not.
I do have a nother server running, but i dont want to let people onto the devolution as im trying to switch over to it.
What can i do?
